description: This file defines an AuthProvider class responsible for managing authentication state in a Flutter application. It handles login, registration, token refresh, profile fetching, and logout, interfacing with API and storage services.

classes.name: AuthProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class managing authentication lifecycle, tokens, and user profile information.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Loads access and refresh tokens from storage without automatically fetching user profile.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Authenticates the user with email and password, stores tokens, and fetches user profile.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user, then automatically logs in.

methods.name: refreshTokens
methods.description: Uses the refresh token to obtain new access and refresh tokens.

methods.name: updateProfile
methods.description: Updates user's profile fields like full name.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Clears tokens and user profile data, effectively logging out the user.
